rules.description: [finder] hyper + [/OG] => go back | open | goto folder
[chrome] hyper + T => new tab; âŒ˜ + ` => reopen last closed tab
[preview] hyper + T | G => text box | goto page; âŒ˜ + M => highlight
hyper + ' | RETURN => move cursor to start | end of line (also, prev | next browser page)
hyper + [<>] => move cursor to start | end of word
hyper + E | D | M => volume control
hyper_se + H | L | J => [mission control] prev | next | show spaces
